in this post, i'm expressing my opinion on the importance of protecting personal information and data privacy. i believe that it's a human right and that we shouldn't compromise on it for the sake of convenience or profit. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphÃ¤re (privacy), and #rechte (rights) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect with others who share the same concerns. the use of the german language and the twitter-style format are intended to make the post relatable and accessible to a german-speaking audience.
